item.title: Firefox Containers Helper Extension v0.0.14 Released
item.description: Firefox Containers Helper v0.0.14 is out now, as of 3/17/2021 - previously v0.0.10, released back in November 2020, a few awesome features have been added! Check out the extension View the extension here! You can also view the source code here on GitHub. Thank you to the community What makes this release of Firefox Containers Helper special is that it has received some awesome community engagement! I really never thought that it would gain enough attention or usage from people around the world for people to create GitHub issues, pull requests, and become supporters
